summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Fractal V2.1 Certification Suite (BLOCK 41.x). All core certification endpoints are functional with minor fixes applied. Deterministic replay working, phase replay testing 5 market phases, drift injection accessible but incomplete as expected.

minor_fixes_applied.issue: JavaScript error 'require is not defined' due to ES module incompatibility
minor_fixes_applied.fix_applied: Converted require() to dynamic import() and made getPreset() async

expected_incomplete_features.issue: Drift injection returns pass: false - not fully integrated with reliability service

passed_tests: GET /api/fractal/health - Module enabled, bootstrap done, 5692 candles, data integrity OK
GET /api/fractal/signal?symbol=BTC - Signal generation working with confidence, risk, and position data
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/cert/replay (BLOCK 41.1) - Deterministic replay verified: 10 runs, 1 unique hash
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/cert/run (BLOCK 41.2) - Full certification suite: 3 tests (replay pass, drift expected fail, phase pass)
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/cert/drift-inject (BLOCK 41.3) - Endpoint accessible, returns structured response (pass=false expected)
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/cert/phase-replay (BLOCK 41.4) - Phase stress testing: 5 phases (2015_recovery, 2017_bubble, 2018_crash, 2020_covid, 2022_bear) all pass
POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/cert/freeze (BLOCK 41.5) - Certification freeze working after fix, generates stamp with preset hash
